divs: sighting detailsstarted taping at a usual location north of mankato. probably saw fifty or so in a few hours. these watchers are plentiful. this is just common activity. it can be viewed by anyone from dusk until about midnight. they are manipulating the weather in a big way, and can be seen in broad daylight if you know what to look for. i am quite bored with them, but feel i need to keep documenting the activity, just in case the activity becomes more dire than it already seems. i would hope to be able to at least warn people, if the activity becomes more ominous. please respond, if you are interested in investigating, as i have noticed an increase of low activity as of late. [youtube channel name removed\cm\tg].
